files.description: Minimal runnable pipeline script that ensures an outputs directory exists then writes /outputs/run_stamp.json with required schema keys and /outputs/run.log with execution details.
Pytest suite that runs the pipeline script and asserts /outputs/run_stamp.json and /outputs/run.log exist and the JSON contains the required schema keys.
Helper script to run pytest and capture the full console output into /outputs/test.log for CI/CD artifact retention.

missionDescription: Add a minimal Python script (e.g., scripts/run_pipeline.py) that writes /outputs/run_stamp.json and /outputs/run.log, then add tests/test_artifacts.py asserting files exist and JSON schema keys are present; run pytest and store console output in /outputs/test.log.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator
